children.Name: Checkbox
children.label: 1. Has he/she ever done contracting job ?

children.Name: Checkbox
children.label: 8. As Per Compliance, Collabera will Conduct a drug test and background check on you. Are you Comfortable with that ?

children.label: Have we discussed about Collabera benefits?

children.Name: Textbox
